message.name: ERR_FV_PAYMENTGROUP_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Payment Group name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PAYMENTGROUP_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: Payment Group name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PAYMENTGROUP_BENEFIT_PRODUCTS_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: One or more benefit products must be selected.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PAYMENTGROUP_BENEFIT_PRODUCT_ALREADY_LINKED
message.locale: Benefit product %1s cannot be linked to this payment group as it is already linked to payment group %2s.

message.name: INF_CHANGES_MADE_NOTICE
message.locale: The changes that you have made would be effective from the next payment(s) that are due.
